title: VN Jewelry Fab Three-Strand Chunky Modern Twist Cultured Freshwater Baroque Pearl Necklace (White)
features: Great design with Fashion Touch chunky Choker Necklace
Featuring attractive genuine cultured freshwater 6-7mm baroque pearls set on a sliding silver clasp
The length of the necklace will vary depending on how much it is twisted and typically is between 44-47cm twisted or 49cm untwisted
You can wear this necklace in several options: Simple three layers strand necklace or twisted chunky choker style.
The pearls have very good lustre and the necklace is perfect for all occasion Fashion, Parties, Birthdays, Informal/Formal, Valentines, Weddings and Anniversaries, day or night wear.
